content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (-11.5, 18.5)
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipes connecting the steam engine and offshore pump

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (0, 0) and a furnace at position (0, 0)

### Copper cable factory at position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (5, 5) and a furnace at position (5, 5)
- Assembling machine at position (5, 5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position (5, 5) to the assembling machine at position (5, 5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing a boiler
- Ensure that the target location for placing a boiler is clear of other entities before attempting to place it. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
